directions: Preheat oven to 350 Mix the oats, coconut, and almonds. Add the oil and honey to oat mixture Toss the oats oil and honey mixture till oats are covered in honey and oil Spread the oats on a greased baking sheet (may need several baking sheets) oats should be spread thin Place baking sheets in the oven Every five minutes check on the oats and toss so that they get an even browning When the oats are brown pull them from the oven and let cool should take around 20 to 30 minutes Add the dried fruit to the cooked oat mixuter
ingredients:
2 cups
                            - coconut 
 3 cups
                            - dried fruit 
 3/4 cup 
                            - honey 
 8 cups
                            - rolled oats 
 2 cups
                            - slivered almonds 
 1  cup
                            - vegetable oil
title: Granola Cereal

directions: Wash and separate the broccoli into stalks
Peel the outer layer from the steams with a vegetable peeler
Cut the stalks into 1 inch lengths
Place the water in a large shallow sauce pan and bring to boil.
Add the broccoli and cover then boil for 10 mintues.
Heat the oil in a large skillet and add the garlic, cook for 10 seconds
Add the broccoli, pepper, and salt then toss the mixture and serve.
ingredients:
1 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 2 bunches
                            - broccoli 
 4 cloves
                            - garlic chopped
 1 teaspoon
                            - kosher salt 
 1 tablespoon
                            - olive oil virgin
 1 cup 
                            - water
title: Garlic Broccoli

directions: Divide the goat cheese into 12 pieces
In a food processor or coffee bean grinder, grind the pecans to a coarse powder
Mix the pecans with the cinnamon in a bowl
In a food processor or coffee bean grinder, grind the rosemary to small pieces
Roll the goat cheese slices into balls, roll in the pecans powder and gently form into patties
Drizzle the honey over the patties and sprinkle with the rosemary
ingredients:
2 teaspoons
                            - cinnamon 
 11 ounces
                            - goat cheese 
 2 tablespoons
                            - honey 
 3 ounces
                            - pecans finely chopped
 2 sprigs
                            - rosemary finely chopped
title: Goat Cheese And Honey
